CustomField.description: Formula field to generate the Policy Marker Code based on the value in ampi__Policy_Marker__c.
CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(ampi__Policy_Marker__c), "Gender Equality" , 1 , "Aid to Environment" , 2 , "Participatory Development/Good Governance" , 3 , "Trade Development" , 4 , "Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity" , 5 , "Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation" , 6 , "Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation" , 7 , "Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification" , 8 , "Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)" , 9 , null )
CustomField.label: Policy Marker Code
